org.jruyi.core

Interface ISslFilterBuilder


  • public interface ISslFilterBuilder
    A builder to build an ssl filter.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  ISslFilterBuilder.ClientAuth
      Defines the possible values for property clientAuth.
      static class  ISslFilterBuilder.EndpointIdAlg
      Defines the possible values for property endpointIdentificationAlgorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • protocol

        ISslFilterBuilder protocol(java.lang.String protocol)
        Sets the requested SSL protocol. "TLS" will be used if not set.
        Parameters:
        protocol - the standard name of the requested protocol.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • provider

        ISslFilterBuilder provider(java.lang.String provider)
        Sets the name of the SSL provider.
        Parameters:
        provider - the name of the provider
        Returns:
        this builder

      • clientAuth

        ISslFilterBuilder clientAuth(ISslFilterBuilder.ClientAuth clientAuth)
        Sets if client authentication is requested/required. This property is only useful in the server mode.
        Parameters:
        clientAuth - client authentication is requested or required
        Returns:
        this builder

      • hostname

        ISslFilterBuilder hostname(java.lang.String hostname)
        Sets the hostname for SAN verification. And may also be used as hints for internal SSL session reuse strategy.

        If hostname is set to null, no SAN verification will be made. If hostname is set to an empty string and the filter is used for a TCPIP based service, the remote address's hostname will be used.

        Parameters:
        hostname - the name of the peer host
        Returns:
        this builder

      • endpointIdentificationAlgorithm

        ISslFilterBuilder endpointIdentificationAlgorithm(ISslFilterBuilder.EndpointIdAlg alg)
        Sets the algorithm to be used for endpoint identification.
        Parameters:
        alg - the algorithm to set
        Returns:
        this builder

      • enabledProtocols

        ISslFilterBuilder enabledProtocols(java.lang.String[] protocols)
        Sets the SSL protocol versions enabled for use.
        Parameters:
        protocols - names of all the protocols to enable
        Returns:
        this builder

      • enabledCipherSuites

        ISslFilterBuilder enabledCipherSuites(java.lang.String[] cipherSuites)
        Sets the cipher suites enabled for use.
        Parameters:
        cipherSuites - names of all the cipher suites to enable
        Returns:
        this builder

      • enableSessionCreation

        ISslFilterBuilder enableSessionCreation(boolean enableSessionCreation)
        Sets whether new SSL sessions may be established. If session creations are not allowed, and there are no existing sessions to resume, there will be no successful handshaking.
        Parameters:
        enableSessionCreation - true indicates that session may be created otherwise false
        Returns:
        this builder

      • sslContextParameters

        ISslFilterBuilder sslContextParameters(ISslContextParameters sslcp)
        Sets the SSL context parameters used for creating SSL context.
        Parameters:
        sslcp - the SSL context parameters to set
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        IFilter<IBuffer,IBuffer> build()
                        throws java.lang.Throwable
        Returns a new SSL filter.
        Returns:
        a new SSL filter
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - if any error happens
